001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
005import retrofit2.http.GET;
006import retrofit2.http.HTTP;
007import retrofit2.http.Header;
008import retrofit2.http.Path;
009
010/**
011 * Requests updates to the {@link Game} object by making {@link HTTP} requests at regular intervals.
012 * These long polls allow users to get updates as players fire shots, and updates whose turn it is,
013 * whose fleets are sunk, and when the game is finished.
014 */
015public interface JataLongPollServiceProxy {
016
017  @GET("games/{key}")
018  Single<Game> getGame(
019      @Path("key") String key,
020      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
021
022}
